body: I don't know if I am right or not but I think that if what you want is sex, at least from what I know, it's cheaper than paying an escort to go on a date with you. So from that perspective I say this guy made the right call. Also I have never seen NTR as an opposite to vanilla. It's the same thing, sometimes women need a little more of attention and sometimes the guy who provides that is not the more outstanding person but the point is... They are there for them.

So, basically what happens is MC finds girl having painful sex where she doesn't enjoy it and cries out that it hurts. Her boyfriend is a jerk and leaves. MC blackmails girl to a date. 

MC feels bad at first, but girl says 'may as well have fun'.  At the end of the date, she asks why he asked for a date instead of sex and his reasoning is that 'she looked like she was in a lot of pain' and so she offers to go 'continue the date' at a love hotel. 

Gentle, loving sex ensues and she realises that sex isn't only painful, but actually feels good too. After sex, she calls her boyfriend, breaks up with him then asks MC he would go on a date with her this time and he agrees happily.

"Listen to me babe, if you don't want me to broadcast the video of you getting fucked in the classroom, you're gonna have to obey everything I say... So what I want from you is... That you come with me to the amusement park!" XD
